description: Ms. codex. Manuscript erroneously foliated beginning on the front flyleaf. Record follows erroneous foliation. Incipit (text 3): الحمد لله رب الكعبة والبلد الحرام
contents: 2. leaves 53b-71a: [Treatise on the five obligatory prayers and the five divine ḥaḍarāt].
5. leaves 78b-104b: [Poem in Ottoman Turkish explaining the Arabic verse "Lā al-khayl yanfaʻu ahlahā wa-lā al-māl * wa-lā taḍurru dhawū al-taḥqīq iqlāl"].
text_language: Arabic and Turkish in Arabic script.
subject: Qurʼan. Sūrat al-Rūm, 1-4—Commentaries—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
